option.description: Compress output by removing some whitespaces.
option.name: compress

option.description: Compress output using clean-css
option.name: clean-css

option.description: Set include paths. Separated by `:'. Use `;' on Windows.
option.name: include-path

option.description: Outputs a v3 sourcemap to the filename (or output filename.map)
option.name: source-map

option.description: adds this path onto the sourcemap filename and less file paths
option.name: source-map-rootpath

option.description: Sets sourcemap base path, defaults to current working directory.
option.name: source-map-basepath

option.description: puts the less files into the map instead of referencing them
option.name: source-map-less-inline

option.description: puts the map (and any less files) into the output css file
option.name: source-map-map-inline

option.description: the complete url and filename put in the less file
option.name: source-map-url

option.description: Set rootpath for url rewriting in relative imports and urls. Works with or without the relative-urls option.
option.name: rootpath

option.description: Turn on or off strict math, where in strict mode, math requires brackets. This option may default to on and then be removed in the future.
option.name: strict-math

option.description: Allow mixed units, e.g. 1px+1em or 1px*1px which have units that cannot be represented.
option.name: strict-units

option.description: Output style. Can be nested (default), compact, compressed, or expanded.
option.name: style

option.description: How many digits of precision to use when outputting decimal numbers.Defaults to 5.
option.name: precision

option.description: Make Compass imports available and load project configuration.
option.name: compass

option.description: Add a sass import path.
option.name: load-path

option.description: Require a Ruby library before running Sass.
option.name: require

option.description: The path to put cached Sass files. Defaults to .sass-cache.
option.name: cache-location

option.description: Don't cache to sassc files.
option.name: no-cache

option.description: Create sourcemap files next to the generated CSS files.
option.name: sourcemap

option.description: Specify the default encoding for Sass files.
option.name: default-encoding

option.description: Output style. Can be nested (default), compact, compressed, or expanded.
option.name: style

option.description: How many digits of precision to use when outputting decimal numbers.Defaults to 5.
option.name: precision

option.description: Make Compass imports available and load project configuration.
option.name: compass

option.description: Add a sass import path.
option.name: load-path

option.description: Require a Ruby library before running Sass.
option.name: require

option.description: The path to put cached Sass files. Defaults to .sass-cache.
option.name: cache-location

option.description: Don't cache to sassc files.
option.name: no-cache

option.description: Create sourcemap files next to the generated CSS files.
option.name: sourcemap

option.description: Specify the default encoding for Sass files.
option.name: default-encoding

option.description: compile without a top-level function wrapper
option.name: bare

option.description: generate source map and save as .map files
option.name: map

option.description: suppress the "Generated by" header
option.name: no-header

option.description: Generate source maps
option.name: sourcemap

option.description: Turns on all experimental features
option.name: experimental
